name: dankman
description:
this is an rpg i started when i was around 14 years old. its been four years of no progress. i came back to it a week ago and fixed all the broken parts. what you will experience is a tale written by a child.

dankman follows the story of a man who put the world into an apocalyptic state. the entire world hates him. you dont redeem yourself.

made in rpgmaker vx ace, playtime 1-1.5 hrs.

edit MAY 9th 2019 : bug fix involving bingo path

edit MAY 10th 2019 : more bug fixes involving fecal forest
